textBox.richText: I have always been a Dilbert fan - to me it was a geekier version of the Far Side.  So, when I got a copy of Dilbert 2.0: 20 Years of Dilbert (a huge freaking book in its own case), I read the whole thing quite fast (with the help of Red Bull).  The book is great, and the cartoonist adds his commentary to many of the cartoons, which is hilarious because Scott Adams is one twisted individual. If you read this book, check out my favorite comics - listed below alongside their page numbers: Pg 25 - Nerd girlfriend Pg 35 - Dating myself Pg 50 - Poem Pg 57 - Toaster Pg 87 - Action items Pg 92 - Cult mentality Pg 104 - Kiss ass Pg 107 - Sheep Pg 109 - Vacation Pg 118 - Consultant Pg 127 - Nerdvana Pg 130 - Excalibert Pg 143 - Date Pg 154 - Nostalgia Pg 164 - Out of shape Pg 177 - Corporate zombies Pg 192 - UNIX Pg 201 - Customers Pg 202 - Teamwork Pg 211 - New computers Pg 230 - Email Pg 233 - Boss types Pg 235-236 - OSes / UNIX Pg 241 - Shallow lives Pg 245 - SQL Pg 247 - Meetings Pg 254 - Sick days Pg 255 - Token ring Pg 256 - Security Pg 259 - Training course Pg 262 - Stupid users Pg 271 - Recommendation Pg 304 - Motivation, consulting Pg 315 - Criticism Pg 352 - PowerPoint Pg 453 - Name Pg 459 - Dress code, school Pg 463 - Cheap help Pg 465 - Knowledge Pg 466 - English degree Pg 468 - Prototype, upgrade Pg 470 - Email Pg 477 - Prototype Pg 483 - Legal crap Pg 486 - Databases Pg 491 - Blame Pg 492 - Programming language Pg 495 - Passwords Pg 508 - Sales Pg 511 - Porn Pg 512 - Purpose of life, shake it off Pg 514 - Contractors Pg 516 - Pirates Pg 520 - Meetings Pg 521 - Trolls Pg 528 - Popcorn Pg 531 - Tech support Pg 534 - CAT6, passwords Pg 535 - Linux Pg 536 - Google Pg 538 - Spreadsheets Pg 540 - Email Pg 546 - Tech support Pg 555 - Office politics Pg 557 - Office politics Pg 560 - Internet / iPhone Pg 561 - Career Pg 571 - Virtualization
